current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_address_found_1: Found dead in railroad gondola car
case_circumstances: John Doe #18-83 was found dead of gunshot wounds 06/20/83 in a gondola car at the Southern Pacific Railroad yards in Bloomington.  He was described as a young Hispanic male in his late teens or early twenties (71", 146 lbs, dark-brown hair, brown eyes).  Documentation found on the body (a pay stub) indicated that the victim's name may have been "Ernesto Carrillo Aguilar".  (possibly from Sonora, Mexico).
